ingredients: 2 slices country bread, nothing too strong
instructions: Heat a small non-stick pan over medium heat.
Spread a generous amount of butter on the outside of 1 of the slices of bread.
Spread pesto on both inner sides.
Sprinkle peanuts on the inner side on the piece of bread with the buttered outside and top with a layer of thinly sliced banana.
Put the top on the sanwich. Place the sandwich in the pan, buttered side down. If you are feeling adventurous, put something heavy on the sandwich as it toasts to get a better golden brown.
Once the first side is golden brown, spread butter on the top and flip the sandwich.
Again, top with something heavy or press with a spatula to get a better toast.
Once the second side is toasted, remove the sandwich from the heat and let cool slightly.
